117439.色を付けるための 必要な素材が足りません。\n必要な素材を 全て そろえてくださ:
You do not have the necessary materials to dye
this color.
<end>

117441.<color_yellow>\n錬金釜についての 説明です。\n<br>\n錬金:
This will explain the Alchemy Pot.
The Alchemy Pot is capable of alchemizing various materials into wonderful items by using a mysterious power.
First, select the item you'd like to alchemize inside of the pot. If you have the necessary materials, you'll alchemize it right away.
After alchemizing, the pot will need to charge before it can be used again. This charge passes by in real time.
Of course, this means that the pot will continue to charge while you are logged out, so feel free to alchemize as you wish.
Try to alchemize all sorts of items with the Alchemy Pot!

117443.錬金釜で <%sL_ITEM> <%dL_ITEMNUM>個が\n完成しています:
There are <%sL_ITEM> <%dL_ITEMNUM> pieces
finished in the smelting pot! Would you like
to retrieve them now?<yesno><close>

119066.<color_yellow>\n武器と盾に 色を付ける説明です。\n<br>\n:
I can change the color and luster of up to two weapons and shields... The smelting pot allows you to change the color and luster of
up to two weapons and shields. But you can't change the color of a weapon or shield that's already equipped. Be aware that some weapons
and shields cannot be changed in color or luster. To change the color, you'll need a flower to dye. Instead of flowers, you can
use colorful bouquets... To change the luster, you'll need luster paint. To change the shine, use the original color... If you
want to change the color of your bouquet back to its original color, you will have to change the shine back to its original color.
If you change the luster, the new luster icon will appear in the color icon... The gloss icon will not be displayed when the original
gloss is... You can get the Colorful Bouquet and Gloss Paint from the DQX Shop... Awakened Adventurer's Square Dragon Quest X Shop
https://sqex.to/dqxshop Add your own colors to your weapons and shields to make your adventures more stylish!

before you can pick up your finished...<end>

154300.チャージ中なので\n錬金釜で アイテムを錬金できません。:
The Alchemy Pot is currently charging, so

154301.<color_yellow>\n錬金釜の 使い方 変更のお知らせです！\n<br:
We've changed the way you use the alchemy pot! When you put an ingredient into the smelting pot, the smelting process will be
completed immediately and you can take out the created item on the spot. Once the item is removed, the charge time written in the
recipe will begin. After the charge time is up, you can start the next alchemy. Of course, even if you're logged out, the charge
time will still elapse, so don't worry about smelting... Use the alchemy kettle to smelt all sorts of things and use them in your
adventures!

249660.<color_yellow>\n武器・盾のカラーリングの\n新機能のお知らせです:
Announcing a new feature for weapon and shield coloring... You can now assign colorful bouquets as an alternative to
flowers for dyeing... You can now change the luster of your equipment using the item "Luster Paint"... However, you cannot change
the luster of an item while it is in its original color... If you change the color back to the original color, the luster will
revert to the original color. If you change the luster, the new luster icon will appear in the color icon... The gloss icon will not
be displayed when the original gloss is... You can get the Colorful Bouquet and Gloss Paint from the DQX Shop... Awakened
Adventurer's Square Dragon Quest X Shop https://sqex.to/dqxshop Add your own colors to your weapons and shields to make your
adventures more stylish!

250335.このカラーリングに 必要な素材を\nコミュニケーションウィンドウの システムログ:
Do you want the materials required for this
livery to be written to the system log in the
communication window?<yesno><close>

250336.コミュニケーションウィンドウの システムログに\nこのカラーリングに 必要な素材:

window, I've written down the materials
needed for this livery!

250784.必要な素材に 染色用の花がない時は\nカラフルブーケが 使えません。:
If the material you need doesn't have flowers
for dyeing, you can use the colorful
bouquet...

253935.必要な素材を 確認してください。\n期限付きの場合は 期限が近いものを使います。:
Make sure you have all the materials you need... If there's an expiration date, we'll use the closest one... Would you like to
color this content?

257624.貴重なアイテムの ツヤめきペイントで \nツヤを変更した箇所が 含まれていますが:
The glossy paint on your precious item includes a section where the gloss has been changed, but are you sure you want to put the
gloss back on?
